Replace.Text: Welcome to! Dominate the theater!
What destroys everything is—man's own malice
Beauty exists in people's hearts, and these fictions are beautiful
My friends, want to try these lines?
A good person like you will definitely get the most applause in the theater.
pointless struggle.
meaningless life.
We are the will of the thousand, the despair of the thousand. [NewLine] Despair is not going away, and we are not going away.
Your ideals cannot be realized, the world has never been beautiful
Of course ~ of course ~ our friends, we love more than gold, don't we?
Oops, you are not on the welcome list at the theater yet.
Did the fish bite the hook, or did the hook kiss the fish?
Hahaha, my friend, the special seats are waiting for your visit at any time.
It's a pity, so I look forward to the next time we meet on stage.
Rest assured, they will love the show and never leave.
They don't seem to be suitable to be our audience.
You see, these golden threads are my best treasures.
Oh, oh, whatever you want.
Sure enough, the malice in people's hearts can never be hidden. (condemns you)
Oh, what a boldness, can we go and put on a good show for your nation?
Interested in seeing a theater performance? We are always welcome.
Can be a little more, we welcome strangers.
Today is also a day with nothing to do.
What are humans made of? Hypocrisy and weakness, and an ugly soul. [NewLine] What are dolls made of? Gears and joints, and the aroma of pine. [NewLine] Dolls are far more reliable than humans~
Look at howling all over the place, I believe you can give a better gift.
But your people seem to be quite happy.
Please, I'm just an ordinary doll.
It is lively when there are many people, welcome your visit.
Hahaha, I'm sorry, it's the closing time of the theater.
They can also show you a lot of good shows, my friend.
The disaster didn't kill us, as a human being, do you want to do it?
Look again, wouldn't it be a pity if such an exquisite puppet [NewLine] refuses?
Believe me, these gifts must be a big surprise.
puppet
Derivatives of the Herrscher of Dominion, they are induced to bring out the deepest and darkest human beings in their hearts.
"We were created by—
What destroys everything is—
Humanity's own malice! "
puppet
Derivatives of the Herrscher of Domination, they were induced to bring out the deepest and darkest human beings in their hearts, but they replaced them with cannons.
"You can't change the malice in people's hearts, you can't, change this ugly world."
The Herrscher of Dominion, The Crowd
It is a product composed of the power of the Herrscher of Consciousness and the Herrscher of Reason, and the power of a thousand strange dolls.
"Your ideals cannot be realized, because the world has never been beautiful!"
Puppet Judge
Chief Inquisitor of Human Civilization
Even if the other puppets don't recognize him
"Why are you up there! Come down for me!"
"Where is this? Who are you?"
"When will the meeting end?"
The leader of the dolls, the popular hope of the dolls, the...

Dominion Theater is an aggressive civilization, which can pose a great threat to other civilizations by matching different dark policy cards to execute puppet actions. Its characteristic unit puppet itself is also an extremely annoying thing.
domination theater
Location
imaginary number space
scale
How big is the darkness of the human heart, how big is the domination theater
population
one thousand (approximately)
capital
domination theater

You are invited! Fall together! Welcome to! Dominate the theater! [NewLine] When building a city, a doll will be provided and all dolls will have +7 experience [NewLine] All units can be sacrificed to the Herrscher of Dominion [NewLine] When using the dark policy card in the Theater of Dominion, its negative effects will be removed at the same time Applied to other players, and converts all diplomatic slots to general slots
Theater for one, stage for thousands
Puppet Judge
Doll·Blade

A terrifying doll that proliferates infinitely. Each doll within the three grids around it will provide +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for itself. Dolls +1 experience value, and make age points -1 [NewLine] Killing units will alternately appear "restore 13 life points for all dolls, +7 experience" and "reduce the civilization of the killed unit by 1 era points, and create in place A puppet of the same type” [NewLine] gets a 50% flanking bonus, and killing a unit will deduct 1 point of era points from itself
Doll · Cannon

A terrifying doll that proliferates infinitely. Each doll within the three grids around it will provide +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for itself. Dolls +1 experience value, and make age points -1 [NewLine] Killing units will alternately appear "restore 13 life points for all dolls, +7 experience" and "reduce the civilization of the killed unit by 1 era points, and create in place A puppet of the same type” [NewLine] gets a 50% flanking bonus, and killing a unit will deduct 1 point of era points from itself
Bread crumbs sprinkled on the stone road leading to the candy house in the forest. welcome! welcome!
puppet
A terrifying doll that proliferates infinitely.
Notice, notice: Please pay attention, this notice announces that the sparrow will be tried in this court.
Stacked Despair: The Birth of a Doll gives it +1 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Stacked Despair: The Birth of a Doll gives it +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength
Domination: Each doll within three grids will provide +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power to itself
Domination: Provide +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength to Dolls
Strategy study: The brain of the puppet shows that it can already play Honkai 3rd, +5[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +1[ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power

Dominated: Each doll within three grids will provide itself with +2 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power [NewLine] Doll Network: When the doll is promoted, it will give all dolls +1 experience value, restore 13 points of life, and -1 era points, get +50% flanking bonus
Domination: Provide +15[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power for three-block dolls

The final work of the puppet, which can only be born when the world sinks into the deepest darkness, can provide all dolls with a huge +10 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power bonus, an extra point of [ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power and 50% of the extra experience
The Herrscher of Dominion, The Crowd
puppet
Strategy study
The doll's brain indicates that it can play Honkai 3rd, +5[ICON_STRENGTH] combat power, +1[ICON_MOVEMENT] movement power
Operation training
The puppet's hands feel that they have to practice more, get +1 attack count
Strategy making
This is the control direction, this is the attack key, this is the dodge key, you have learned how to play Honkai 3rd, and provide 1+1% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value output for all cities

Come and play Honkai 3rd, the plot is sweet, and provide 1+1% [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value output for all cities

Thulium gate

Dolls can be purchased with Faith; Thulium will not be framed by spies; the city you serve ignores religious pressure [NewLine] Holy Land provides +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith Value, unlocking Thulium’s blessing for Dolls
male

The output of adjacent science and technology value of the academy will provide an additional output of the same amount of faith value. The academy provides +2 [ICON_SCIENCE] science and technology value [NewLine] to unlock the teaching of thulium for the puppet
chicken

The output of adjacent gold coins in the business center will provide an additional output of the same amount of faith value, and the business center will provide +2 [ICON_GOLD] gold coins [NewLine] to unlock the gift of thulium for the puppet
with

The output of adjacent cultural value in the theater will provide an additional output of the same amount of faith value, and the theater provides +2 [ICON_CULTURE] cultural value [NewLine], unlocking the enlightenment of thulium for the puppet
dance

The puppets each make up their own minds to do what they want to do. [NewLine] "Children are robbed of lollipops, and armed conflicts occur between countries. In short, it is all due to us."
Thulium's Blessing: After promotion, it provides 2% [ICON_FAITH] Faith Points for all cities (the upper limit of the age of existence), and provides +5% adjacent output for holy lands when it exists
Thulium's gift: After promotion, it provides 2% [ICON_GOLD] gold coins to all cities (the upper limit of the age exists), and when it exists, it provides +5% adjacent output to the commercial center
Thulium's Encouragement: After promotion, it provides 1% [ICON_PRODUCTION] production to all cities (there is an era cap), and when it exists, it provides +5% adjacent output to industrial areas
Thulium's Teachings: After promotion, it provides 1% [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value to all cities (the upper limit of the age exists), and provides +5% adjacent output to the academy when it exists

Thulium's Apocalypse: After promotion, it provides 1% [ICON_CULTURE] culture value for all cities (there is an upper limit in the age), and when it exists, it provides +5% adjacent output for theaters
Thulium's dinner party: Provide 2% [ICON_FOOD] food to all cities after promotion (the upper limit of the age exists)
"Line": The golden thread makes people immobile, -3 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
"Line": The golden thread makes people immobile, -4 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
"Line": The golden thread makes people unable to move, -6 [ICON_STRENGTH] combat power
"Show Ticket"

Sacrifice[NewLine] If it is not a puppet, it will gain extra faith according to its combat power. If it is a non-combat unit, create a puppet. [NewLine] If it is a puppet, it will get the following effects according to the existing promotion. +1 [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat power (upper limit is 5), 1 experience, recovery of 13 health points [NewLine] Operation training: Reset the movement and attack times of all dolls [NewLine] Raiders production / plot analysis: complete the current technology / municipal administration 10+10% progress [NewLine] Love Gate: +1 [ICON_FAITH] faith output for all cities, causing 25 damage to surrounding units [NewLine] Water post: +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity for all cities, study how to make mob

Operation training
No matter how strong the talent is, you have to practice it if you want to score points. Practice it for me! Don't hang up!
Strategy making
The puppets always share their experience selflessly, seeking defeat alone!
Interpretation of the plot
An excellent puppet must learn to find a knife to eat by itself.

domination theater
"This is the theater of domination, a stage for thousands of people!"
"Despair won't go away, and we won't go away!"
"The golden thread is already wrapped around you!"
——In fact, they are all happy crashing brothers
